title.rendered: Why You Should Stay in a Cabin at the Arkansas River Outpost

content.rendered:
Are you searching for a weekend getaway adventure where you can have the time of your life but at the same time relax and enjoy yourself? Then AVA Rafting and Zipline's Granite Outpost is where you need to be. There is an endless amount of activities that you can spread out over a couple of days. The best part of this location? There are on site cabins available! These stunning, log cabins are located right on AVA's property, just steps from the outpost. Here are the top 4 reasons why you should choose to stay in a cabin this summer while partaking in AVA's most thrilling activities.

1- Convenience. What is better than having the convenience of rolling out of bed and waking up right at the location you need to start at for a day full of fun?! On top of that, you have the option of having a mouth watering, delicious breakfast cooked by AVA's Chef Dave. Plus, right when you get back from a wet and wild rafting extravaganza, you are a couple steps away from your cabins, a warm shower and dry clothes! What could be better than that?

2- It's Affordable! If you are coming out to Colorado for vacation and have already had the traveling expenses and transportation costs, then here is another reason to check out the log cabins AVA offers. These four bed bunk log cabins are much more affordable compared to buying a hotel room for a couple days or even renting a house. Our cabins allow you to still have the Colorado experience you are searching for while enjoying your full bathroom and a warm night of sleep.

3- It is the Quintessential Colorado Experience. If you are in search of getting the full Colorado experience, then AVA can make that happen, from staying in our cabins to filling your days with activities such as whitewater rafting, zip lining, horseback riding, fly fishing and much much more! Make sure to check out all that we have to offer; our new video gives you an inside look at some of the activities available. 

4- It can be a Romantic Getaway. Looking for an idea on how to spend your anniversary or even just a weekend getaway with your significant other? AVA has just what you need! No matter if you are an adventurous couple or not, we have whitewater rafting trips to please everyone. If you want to spice it up just a little then you can head into Buena Vista for a night on the town after a day of rafting and zip lining!

What is there not to like, when there is all you need in one location? AVA Rafting & Zipline is willing to take on the challenge of making this summer's vacation the BEST vacay of your life! If you are interested in booking a cabin, you can do so online or by giving our Trip Specialists a call at 877-RAFTING.
